text: usakee qudarat kee nishaaniyon mein se ek ye bhee hai ki tum zameen ko khî€¼ushk aur beaab o gayaah dekhate ho phir jab ham us par paanee barasa dete hain to lahalahaane lagatee hai aur phool jaatee hai jis khuda ne (murda) zameen ko zinda kiya vah yaqeenan murdon ko bhee jilaega beshak vah har cheez par qaadir hai
